attributes.description: Practically BRAND NEW With ONLY 19 000 km. This 2020 Model BMW 320d Is A Real Sports Machine. Fun To Drive, Luxurious And Fitted With All The Modern Tech You May Require. It Is Majestically Appointed In A Mineral White Metallic With A Vernasca Black Leather Interior And Aluminium Interior Trim. It Retains A Full Service History With BMW, Balance Of The 5 Year Or 100 000 Motorplan, All Books And Spare Keys. Amazing Features Include A Glass Sunroof, LED Headlights With Extended Scopes, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, Reverse Camera, Digital Plus, Parking Assistance System, Multi Functional Steering Wheel, Bluetooth, Phone Charger, Satellite Navigation, Preparation For Connected Drive And Apple Car Play, USB Input, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint And 18 Inch Alloy Wheels. The BMW 320d Is A Fast Seller. Take Advantage Today! Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
